titleInfo.title: Portico of the Temple of Dendera

mods.abstract: Temple of Hathor Facade at Dendereh (Ptolemaic-Roman Period, ca. 116 B.C. - A.D. 34); main Temple of Hathor facade taken from a rocky hill, a western man and Egyptian boy (left foreground); "Frith No. 10 1857" in black on print bottom right corner; "PORTICO OF THE Temple OF DENDERA" in black along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of the Friends of Egyptology, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
